name: ACCELERA® EXT
description: ACCELERA® EXT is part a of DUR-A-FLEX’s family of fast-track, seamless floor systems. It is specially designed to provide a longer working time than regular ACCELERA to facilitate applications in larger areas. It is a two-component proprietary blend of polymers featuring a fastcuring resin and hardener. ACCELERA EXT is UV stable and offers excellent stain resistance, it may be used anywhere standard ACCELERA is specified. It is a s a low-odor resin and hardener and is available clear or pre-pigmented.
